    • Method Detail

      • fetchString

        public static java.lang.String fetchString(java.lang.String reqType,
                                           CrawlerSession session,
                                           java.lang.String url,
                                           java.lang.String urlParameters,
                                           java.util.List<org.apache.http.cookie.Cookie> cookies)
        Fetch a text string from a URL, either by a GET ou POST http request.
        Parameters:
        reqType - The type of the http request. GET_REQUEST or POST_REQUEST.
        url - The url from which we will fetch the data.
        urlParameters - The urlParameters, or parameter field of the request, in case of a POST request. null if we have a GET request.
        marketCrawler - An instance of the MarketCrawler class to use the log method, or null if we want to print System.err
        Returns:
        A String.

      • fetchDocument

        public static org.jsoup.nodes.Document fetchDocument(java.lang.String reqType,
                                                     CrawlerSession session,
                                                     java.lang.String url,
                                                     java.lang.String urlParameters,
                                                     java.util.List<org.apache.http.cookie.Cookie> cookies)
        Fetch a HTML Document from a URL, either by a GET ou POST http request.
        Parameters:
        reqType - The type of the http request. GET_REQUEST or POST_REQUEST.
        url - The url from which we will fetch the data.
        urlParameters - The urlParameters, or parameter field of the request, in case of a POST request. null if we have a GET request.
        marketCrawler - An instance of the MarketCrawler class to use the log method, or null if we want to print System.err
        Returns:
        A Document with the data from the url passed, or null if something went wrong.

      • fetchJSONObject

        public static org.json.JSONObject fetchJSONObject(java.lang.String reqType,
                                                  CrawlerSession session,
                                                  java.lang.String url,
                                                  java.lang.String payload,
                                                  java.util.List<org.apache.http.cookie.Cookie> cookies)
        Fetch a json object from the API, either by a GET ou POST http request.
        Parameters:
        reqType - The type of the http request. GET_REQUEST or POST_REQUEST.
        url - The url from which we will fetch the data.
        payload - The payload, or parameter field of the request, in case of a POST request. null if we have a GET request.
        marketCrawler - An instance of the MarketCrawler class to use the log method, or null if we want to print System.err
        Returns:
        A JSONObject with the data from the url passed, or null if something went wrong.

      • fetchJSONArray

        public static org.json.JSONArray fetchJSONArray(java.lang.String reqType,
                                                CrawlerSession session,
                                                java.lang.String url,
                                                java.lang.String payload,
                                                java.util.List<org.apache.http.cookie.Cookie> cookies)
        Fetch a json array from the API, either by a GET ou POST http request.
        Parameters:
        reqType - The type of the http request. GET_REQUEST or POST_REQUEST.
        url - The url from which we will fetch the data.
        payload - The payload, or parameter field of the request, in case of a POST request. null if we have a GET request.
        marketCrawler - An instance of the MarketCrawler class to use the log method, or null if we want to print System.err
        Returns:
        A JSONArray with the data from the url passed, or null if something went wrong.

        Parameters:

        marketCrawler - An instance of the MarketCrawler class to use the log method, or null if we want to print System.err
        Returns:
        The integer code. Null if we have an exception.

      • processContent

        private static java.lang.String processContent(PageContent pageContent)
        Parse the page content, either to get a html or a plain text In case we are expecting JSONObject or JSONArray response from an API, the content will be parsed as a plain text. Otherwise it will be parsed as a htlm format.
        Parameters:
        pageContent -
        Returns:
        String with the request response, either in html or plain text format
